The PPS43C is an improved version of the Soviet PPSH41 SMG. I.O. Inc. redesigned this historical firearm to shoot from a closed bolt position as a semi-automatic pistol. title: For Sale:  Silencerco 22Sparrow
postcontent:
I have several of these in stock! $415.00 

Please respond with name, email, and phone number or I will not respond!

All NFA laws apply.

The 22Sparrow is the first silencer in the world to offer the patented multi part containment (MPC) technology, which allows the 22sparrow to be easily disassembled for cleaning and maintenance after heavy use.

Because the .22 LR round is not copper jacketed, molten lead and carbon debris will explode into the silencer when the projectile exits the muzzle. After some time, it is possible for a .22 suppressor to fill completely with lead and become heavy and ineffective. To avoid this issue, .22 silencers must be disassembled for cleaning and regular maintenance.

Until Silencerco introduced the 22Sparrow, the only .22 silencers that could be disassembled for cleaning required a cleaning every 50 to 200 rounds. However, often the components of those silencers would be fused together and unable to come apart. Competitor products on the market have baffles in their .22 silencers that must be removed by twisting the outer tube around the baffles and/or sliding the outer tube off of the baffles. When the lead and carbon debris adhere to the inner wall of the outer tube and fill the spaces between the baffles and the outer tube, there is simply too much buildup of fouling and lead to remove the outer tube in that manner.

title: For Sale:  Arsenal SA93 AK-47
postcontent:
These were briefly imported in 1993 and by most accounts the finest milled AK ever imported. They came in neutered however. This one has all the work done for you to make it look like it should. The de-banning was done professionally  Military Gunsmith. The de-banning included the following. The stock is an IWD stock made for the single tang rifle. The trigger group is a G2. The donor parts are from a milled Bulgarian ak 47 kit. This includes the upper and lower handguard, handguard retainer, the pistol grip, the cleaning rod, gas block, front sight post, and muzzle break. Muzzle was threaded to standard 14x1. I test fired about 15rds through the rifle only but no idea on the total round count on the gun but I suspect very low. Barrel is flawless and mirror shinny.. Easy fix if it is crooked but I have not shot this on paper. The donor parts were not refinished so the gun has a BFPU look about it which I really like. I will also include a sling and correct type bayonet and  5 mags.
$1500 Shipped

title: For Sale/Trade:  IVER JOHNSON HAMMERLESS 38 REVOLVER
postcontent:
this is one of the second runs for this model.
First run models had single post for  break top and free spinning cylinders. 
Second run models had double post for break-top and free spinning cylinders.
Third runs added locked cylinders to the second run models
This fact makes the manufacture date easy to identify.  This model was  manufactured in 1896
Although it's main appeal is to collectors, it is a beautiful stainless steel revolver that  holds 5 rounds of 38 shorts and has beautiful wooden handle grips. It functions like a new gun, but being over a hundred years old, you can expect a few scratches, but they are only obvious at close examination.  Collectors tell me that if they don't see some signs of age they challenge the date of manufacture date.  Comes with 25 rounds of Ammo

text if interested.  REDACTED

title: For Sale:  Vintage Savage 1899 lever action in 250-3000 Savage
postcontent: Vintage Savage 1899 lever action rifle in the very rare 250-3000 Savage caliber.  This rifle is in excellent condition and would make a nice addition to any firearm collector's arsenal.   This rifle has been in my family for generations and was handed down to me by my late Grandfather.   It has been a safe queen for years.   It was supposedly the first caliber to ever achieve 3000 fps hence the cartridge name.   You can still buy ammo for it online.   I believe Remington and Winchester still manufacture them.   It has also been known that certain collector's of the Savage 99 specifically seek out the ones that actually say "250-3000 savage" on the barrel making it more rare as opposed to just "250 Savage".   This rifle states "250-3000 Savage" on the barrel.  This also comes with an original vintage 4x Weaver Marksman scope.   Also included I have 144 rounds of 250-3000 savage ammo and 103 spent casings for reloading.   I hate to sell this family heirloom but I simply do not have any need for it and I just found out that I am losing my job so I have to do what I have to do.   I have seen these sell in upwards of $2300 online at times.   I'm asking $1,100 OBO cash only no trades.   If interested please text me at (five one three) 383-9478.

WTT a 1951 Colt Challenger 22LR, 1951, 4 1/2 inch, 95% condition, with 2 magazines, Original Bakelite Grips, Custom holster and custom magazine holster. May also consider a Springfield XDS.
The Colt Challenger (also known as the Woodsman Sport Model)is part of the Second Series and was made between 1950-1955. All the Woodsman's were manufactured by the American Colt's Manufacturing Company from 1915 to 1977. It was designed by John Moses Browning himself. The frame design changed over time, in three distinct series: series one being 1915–1947, series two 1947–1955, and series three being 1955–1977. The Second Series Sports Woodsmans, the Challenger model, unlike the Woodsman 6 1/2" barrel model, has a spring catch at the butt and a C suffix to the serial number. title: For Sale:  Remington 887 Tactical 12 Gauge Shotgun
postcontent:
I have a Remington 887 Tactical 12 Gauge Shotgun for sale. Holds 7+1 Rounds.

I love it to death but I have other things on my mind that I want to fund with the sale of this. This barely kicks compared to other shotguns I've played with. It sits always cleaned and lubricated with rem oil after every time I've shot it. Had less than 50 rounds of only 00Buck through it. Shoots straight. No issues. No slugs through it. It was my second of these, there is also a hunting version. Obviously if I didn't like it, I wouldn't have bought another. No wear marks whatsoever that I have found. Practically mint condition. 

Reasons to buy it:
-You have no 12 gauge shotgun.
-You want to add to your collection.
-You are a first time gun buyer/shotgun buyer.
-You want to look like a bad ass at the range and or hunting. 
-You want a shotgun with very few places to rust.
-You want a shorter shotgun.
-You want a great home defense shotgun. 
-You want to be able to mount a flashlight on the end of it. (yes it has a tactical rail at the tip)
-You want to mount a scope or red dot or some variant of an EOtech on it. (it also has a tactical rail on the top for mounting anything you'd like)
-You want to say things like SAY HELLO TO MY LITTLE FRIEND right before you blow the crap out of a target.
-You want girls all over you.
-You want people to ask what it is and where they can get one every time you go to the range.

Reasons you don't want it:
-You are a pansy.
-You like the Spice Girls.
-You idolize Richard Simmons.
-You are Richard Simmons.
-You are too weak to hold just under 7 pounds. 
-You prefer Tab over beer.
-You drive a scooter.

It comes with a shotgun sling that hold 15? rounds I think, and I have a blue maglight and an attachemnt that I will throw in. And I will also add some Federal 00Buck with it somewhere in the neighborhood of 30-50 rounds. 

Read about the model here.
http://www.remington.com/products/firearms/shotguns/model-887/model-887-nitro-mag-tactical.aspx

I am asking $450. I think it is a fair price. Not really looking lower considering that is what it is new without shells and the sling, sling attachments, and the flashlight, and attachment for it. Plus MSRP is $524 and the only one on here that I saw already is more than mine without anything with it.

title: For Sale:  AK, Saiga,Galill  Recoil Buffer's "Keyhole/Reversible" 4 Pack
location: Northwest Indiana   Lake County   Dyer, Indiana, United States
postcontent:
Recoil buffers are recommended by everyone who understands the internal working of a firearm and is looking to protect their investment. Extend the working life of your AK Saiga or Galil by using our 2 sided recoil buffer. We've sold thousands of these over the past 7 years with hundreds of return buyers. No special tools are needed to install the Key Hole/Dual Sided buffers. Make sure the firearm is unloaded! Step 1. Remove the receiver dust cover. Step 2. Take the recoil assembly out of the firearm. Step 3. insert the recoil assembly through the buffer. Step 4. Re-install the recoil assembly and Step 5. Replace the dust cover. Done! Less than 60 seconds to protect your investment. These are the only buffers that can be reversed to increase the life span of the buffer. Now you have 8 recoil buffers! Each side should give you protection for 500 to 750 rounds.

title: For Sale:  RARE! Current Issue AN/TVS-5 Crew Served Weapon Night Sight!
location: Southeast Kansas. Close to Joplin too, Southeast, KS, Kansas
postcontent:
This is the real deal. Still currently issued to Marines serving in combat areas overseas. 

Perfect working order and looks almost new. Includes: Operating Manual, Lens Cover, Tri-pod, case. 

I am open to trades and I'll consider reasonable offers!

Email for more pictures and leave your number if you prefer texting. 


---
'This model has the modern upgrades which added a new lens and enhanced illumination. 

Primary function: Image intensification night sight for detecting, acquiring, and engaging targets at night. Attaches to M2 .50 caliber heavy machine gun. May be used for surveillance and observation either mounted on the weapon system, tripod or hand held.
Manufacturer: IMO, VARO, Garland, Texas and various vendors
Length: 15 inches (38.1 centimeters)
Width: 6 inches (15.24 centimeters)
Height: 6 inches (15.24 centimeters)
Weight: 8 pounds (3.63 kilograms)
Magnification: 6.5x
Range, Vehicle-Sized Target:
Starlight: 1000 yards (914 meters)
Moonlight: 1200 yards (1096.8 meters)
Field of view: 9° (circular)
Power source: 2.7 volt mercury battery: BA-1567/U, BA-5567/U, BA-3058/U
Unit Replacement Cost: $14,005

Features: The AN/TVS-5 Night Vision Sight is a portable, battery operated, electro-optical instrument used for observation and aimed fire of weapons at night. It amplifies reflected light such as moonlight, starlight, and sky glow so that the viewed scene becomes visible to the operator. An eye guard prevents visible and infrared light from being emitted from the eyepiece. The AN/TVS-5 is presently the standard night sight for the M2 .50 Caliber and 40mm MK19 heavy machine guns.

The AN/TVS-5 can be tripod mounted for surveillance, however it is generally used in the Marine Corps as a crew-served weapon night sight. The sight comes furnished with the mounting bracket and reticle for the M2 machine gun. Brackets and reticles for use with other weapons must be separately requisitioned. A carrying bag and battery adapter for low temperature operations may also be requisitioned.

Background: The AN/TVS-5 was designed in the 1970s to provide a night fighting capability with crew-served weapons. It was procured during the 1980s and delivered to the Fleet Marine Forces upon receipt.

title: For Sale:  AK Recoil Buffer "Keyhole Style Reversible"  4 Pack
location: Northwest Indiana   Lake County   Dyer, Indiana, United States
postcontent:
Recoil buffers are recommended by everyone who understands the internal working of a firearm and is looking to protect their investment. Extend the working life of your AK or AK type action i.e Seiga,etc. by using our 2 sided recoil buffer. We've sold thousands of these over the past 7 years with hundreds of return buyers. No special tools are needed to install the Key Hole/Dual Sided buffers. Make sure the firearm is unloaded! Step 1. Remove the receiver dust cover. Step 2. Take the recoil assembly out of the firearm. Step 3. insert the recoil assembly through the buffer. Step 4. Re-install the recoil assembly and Step 5. Replace the dust cover. Done! Less than 60 seconds to protect your investment. These are the only buffers that can be reversed to increase the life span of the buffer. Now you have 8 recoil buffers! Each side should give you protection for 500 to 750 rounds. 
MAIL ORDER ONLY....We accept Visa/MasterCard, Postal Money Order and PayPal. FYI - If you use PayPal DO NOT DESCRIBE the parts as “GUN PARTS”. They have a thing for anything gun related. Unless of course it is listed on eBAY and then for some reason its OK. Its because they are owned by eBAY!
